companies.name: Optavia
companies.products: Weight loss meal replacements, health coaching programs, nutritional supplements
companies.usp: Doctor-developed Optimal Weight 5&1 Plan with personal coaching support
companies.compensation_highlights: 15% commission on client orders, consistency bonuses up to $1,000, accelerator bonuses for new coaches
companies.notes: Major US weight loss/coaching company, $1B+ revenue, formerly Medifast

companies.name: Oriflame
companies.products: Skincare, cosmetics, fragrances, nutritional supplements, home fragrances
companies.usp: European heritage beauty brand with natural ingredients and sustainable practices
companies.compensation_highlights: Tiered commissions, monthly bonuses, car programs for top achievers
companies.notes: Large European cosmetics company, operates in 60+ countries, 3 million+ Brand Partners

companies.name: Nikken
companies.products: Magnetic therapy products, sleep systems, water purification, nutritional supplements, personal care
companies.usp: Pioneering magnetic wellness technology with Japanese innovation for over 48 years
companies.compensation_highlights: Retail profit margins, generational bonuses, global expansion opportunities
companies.notes: Established wellness company, global presence, world leader in magnetic health products

companies.name: Vorwerk
companies.products: Thermomix all-in-one cooking appliance, Kobold vacuum cleaners, home products
companies.usp: German-engineered Thermomix - 12 appliances in one, revolutionizing home cooking
companies.compensation_highlights: High commission rates, flexible schedule, training and support
companies.notes: Major European home products company, operates in 60+ countries, strong direct sales model

companies.name: Stella & Dot
companies.products: Jewelry, accessories, handbags, scarves, modern vintage designs
companies.usp: Boutique-style fashion jewelry with trunk show parties and flexible entrepreneurship
companies.compensation_highlights: 25-35% commission, 50% off first 30 days, team building bonuses
companies.notes: Popular US jewelry/accessories company, strong social selling model

companies.name: PartyLite
companies.products: Candles, home fragrance, diffusers, flameless fragrances, home decor
companies.usp: Premium quality candles with unique party-based shopping experience
companies.compensation_highlights: DTC model in North America, traditional consultant model in Europe
companies.notes: Transitioned to DTC in North America 2024, traditional MLM model continues in Europe

companies.name: Princess House
companies.products: Cookware, dinnerware, glassware, crystal, kitchen tools, home decor
companies.usp: High-end European-style kitchenware with lifetime warranties and party-based selling
companies.compensation_highlights: 25% commission starting, 30% at higher tiers, weekly pay, $199 starter kit
companies.notes: 30,000+ consultants, 114% growth 2019-2022, US and Mexico markets

companies.name: Bode Pro
companies.products: Immune boosters, energy drinks, nutritional supplements, cellular nutrition products
companies.usp: Cutting-edge cellular nutrition technology with scientific innovation
companies.compensation_highlights: Binary compensation plan, fast start bonuses, matching bonuses
companies.notes: Acquired by Zinzino in Sept 2025, operates primarily in North America and Japan

companies.name: Neolife
companies.products: Nutritional supplements, vitamins, whole food concentrates, sports nutrition, skin care
companies.usp: 67 years of whole food nutrition science with products backed by clinical research
companies.compensation_highlights: Up to 30% retail profit, generational bonuses, no monthly minimums
companies.notes: Formerly GNLD, operates in 50+ countries, pioneer in whole food supplementation

companies.name: Youngevity
companies.tagline: Add Years to Your Life and Life to Your Years
companies.products: Nutritional supplements, health products, spa & beauty, essential oils, hemp products
companies.usp: 90 For Life philosophy - 90 essential nutrients for optimal health and longevity
companies.compensation_highlights: 30% commission on sales, 5-8% on downline, fast start bonuses
companies.notes: Over 2,000 products across six retail categories, Dr. Joel Wallach founder

companies.name: SendOutCards
companies.products: Custom greeting cards, personalized gifts, relationship marketing tools
companies.usp: Mobile app for sending physical cards with your handwriting - under $1 per card
companies.compensation_highlights: Commissions on cards and gifts, team building bonuses, residual income
companies.notes: 60,000 distributors, 100M+ cards delivered, unique greeting card/gift niche

companies.name: Touchstone Essentials
companies.products: Liquid zeolite detox, organic superfoods, gut health supplements, wellness products
companies.usp: Nanotechnology-based liquid zeolite for cellular detox and organic whole food nutrition
companies.compensation_highlights: Direct sales commissions, team building bonuses, membership rewards
companies.notes: Record-breaking sales 2025, expanded detox line with Para-Shield launch

companies.name: Rain International
companies.products: Soul (black cumin/raspberry/grape seed), Core, Bend joint support, seed-based supplements
companies.usp: Revolutionary seed-based nutrition - concentrated nutrients from nature's most potent seeds
companies.compensation_highlights: $104.95 startup, binary compensation, fast start bonuses, global expansion
companies.notes: Founded 11.11.11, global presence, unique seed nutrition category

companies.name: Purium
companies.products: Organic superfoods, detox cleanses, weight loss supplements, vegan protein, green powders
companies.usp: USDA Organic Certified, Non-GMO superfoods with 30+ years of organic innovation
companies.compensation_highlights: 20% commission on all orders, $50 monthly bonus at $1000 sales, infinity bonuses
companies.notes: Premium organic superfoods, strong vegan/plant-based focus, e-commerce model

companies.name: LimeLife by Alcone
companies.products: Professional makeup, skincare, beauty tools, long-wear cosmetics
companies.usp: 60+ years of professional makeup artistry expertise brought to everyday consumers
companies.compensation_highlights: 20-40% commissions, 20% product discount, no minimums, starter kits from $29
companies.notes: Operates in US, Canada, UK, Ireland, Germany, France, Spain, Austria
